title: Salmon en croute stuffed with pesto wild rice
ingredients: ['95g wild rice', '250ml water', '1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 teaspoons salt', '1/4 onion, chopped', '1/4 red pepper, chopped', '115g pesto', '60g marinated artichoke hearts, drained and coarsely chopped', 'zest of 1/2 unwaxed lemon', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '2 sheets puff pastry', '675g skinless boneless salmon fillet', '1 egg yolk']
